attributes.action: reinstate the human right of every UK citizen to State respect for the confidentiality of our personal medical records. By establishing for us the right to veto the upload of all or part of our personal medical records onto the EMISS Electronic Patient Record National Database, (commonly known as the NHS ‘Spine’). On grounds of our personal opinion that those records already contain data, or have the future potential to contain data, that we regard as personally embarrassing or potentially personally life-damaging, and/or that we do not wish to become commonplace knowledge even amongst members of the medical profession who we have not personally authorised to possess that knowledge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
